resources.string: Changez les actions des touches physiques
Appuyez sur la couleur ci dessous pour l\'appliquer
Changer le style de l\'icône de la batterie dans la barre d\'état
Afficher le pourcentage de la batterie
Style de l\'icône de la batterie
Réveiller lors du branchement pour la recharge
Allumer l\'écran lors du branchement ou du débranchement sur une source d\'alimentation
Afficher l’état de la batterie de l\'appareil Bluetooth
Afficher le pourcentage de la batterie de l\'appareil Bluetooth connecté, si disponible
Rendre les notifications flottantes moins dérangeantes
Afficher les notifications flottantes uniquement pour les applis de messagerie
Afficher le curseur de luminosité dans le panneau de paramètres rapides
Afficher le curseur de luminosité en bas du volet des réglages rapides
Afficher le bouton de luminosité automatique
Bouton de luminosité automatique à droite
Afficher le bouton de luminosité automatique à droite du curseur de luminosité
Boutons de contrôle de la luminosité
Afficher les boutons pour augmenter ou diminuer la luminosité
Pas de menu marche/arrêt sur l\'écran de verrouillage
Désactiver le menu Marche/Arrêt sur l’écran de verrouillage
Notifications bruyantes lorsque l\'appareil est allumé
Désactiver pour bloquer le son des notifications et les vibrations lorsque l\'écran est allumé
Jouer le son de notification de chaque application une seule fois par période définie
Moins de notifications gênantes pendant un appel
Vibrer au lieu d\'émettre un son pour les notifications lors des appels
Afficher les infos du média en mode Veille
Configurer les infos du média en mode Veille

Ambient Music Ticker shows playing music track info within Ambient display screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also double tap on track info to skip track.
Configurer l\'apparence de l\'horloge et de la date dans la barre d\'état
L\'horloge au format 24 heures est activée
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Afficher une date personnalisée avant l\'horloge
Doit être dans le format JJ/MM/AA
Activer l\'illustration de couverture multimédia sur l\'écran de verrouillage
Activer le visualiseur sur l\'écran de verrouillage
Afficher le visualiseur sur l\'écran de verrouillage pendant la lecture de la musique
Utiliser une couleur prédéfinie au lieu d\'une couleur générée
Shows the visualization bars also on ambient display (but less opaque)
Permuter les boutons de volume basé sur la rotation de l\'appareil
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Désactiver les notifications flottantes dans ces applications
Désactiver les notifications flottantes venant de ces applications
Vibrer lorsque un raccourci est touché dans les paramètres rapides
Décrocher par les touches de volume
Contrôler les appels avec les touches de volume
Utiliser l\'ancienne icône de données mobiles
Utiliser les icones d\'Android Oreo, et avant\n SystemUI redémarrera
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Contrôle du volume de la sonnerie
Keys control media slider by default. Enable to switch to ring tone slider.
Customize number of steps in volume panel
Personnaliser la boîte de dialogue du panneau de volume
Active volume stream will be displayed on the screen even if disabled here. Volume streams enabled here would be displayed forcefully.
Afficher l\'indicateur du débit Internet dans la barre d\'état
Masquer le test de débit lorsque il n\'y a aucune activité
Masquer automatiquement à partir d\'un certain débit Internet (en KB/s)
Masquer les flèches de l\'indicateur de vitesse de connexion
Place indicator in either status bar or expanded header (recommended for displays with notch cutouts)
Modifier le panneau de paramètres rapides
Afficher le pied de page de sécurité
Afficher le statut du VPN en haut des paramètres rapides
Shows information on top of the QS panel
Make your status bar look awesome with a custom logo
Utiliser les couleurs du fond d\'écran
Définir la couleur des paramètres rapides en fonction du fond d\'écran
Désactiver les thèmes des paramètres rapides venant d\'autres logiciels de thème
Touch status bar to toggle visibility
Show the clock widget on the lockscreen
Afficher les icônes date, la météo, les alarmes et Ne pas déranger sur l\'écran de verrouillage
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Afficher un bouton pour forcer l\'arrêt d\'une application dans le menu d\'appui long sur une notification
Style des tuiles des réglages rapides
Une tentative de forme de montagne
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
When wired headset is plugged in
When BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When BT headset is plugged in
When wired or BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When wired or BT headset is plugged in
Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB
Alpha value of the On-The-Go overlay
Allow swiping across right or left on navbar to enable
Enable the running services icon in the footer

This is the time, after becoming inactive, at which we start looking at the motion sensor to determine if the device is being left alone. We don\'t do this immediately after going inactive just because we don\'t want to be continually running the significant motion sensor whenever the screen is off

If we don\'t receive a callback from AnyMotion in this amount of time + locating_to, we will change from STATE_SENSING to STATE_INACTIVE, and any AnyMotion callbacks while not in STATE_SENSING will be ignored
This is how long we will wait to try to get a good location fix before going in to idle mode
The desired maximum accuracy (in meters) we consider the location to be good enough to go on to idle. We will be trying to get an accuracy fix at least this good or until locating_to expires
This is the time, after seeing motion, that we wait after becoming inactive from that until we start looking for motion again
This is the time, after the inactive timeout elapses, that we will wait looking for significant motion until we truly consider the device to be idle
This is the initial time, after being idle, that we will allow ourself to be back in the IDLE_PENDING state allowing the system to run normally until we return to idle
Maximum pending idle timeout (time spent running) we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current pending idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the initial time that we want to sit in the idle state before waking up again to return to pending idle and allowing normal work to run
Maximum idle duration we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the minimum time we will allow until the next upcoming alarm for us to actually go in to idle mode
Max amount of time to temporarily whitelist an app when it receives a high tickle
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an MMS
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an SMS
This is the time, after becoming inactive, that we go in to the first light-weight idle mode
This is amount of time we will wait from the point where we decide we would like to go idle until we actually do, while waiting for jobs and other current activity to finish
This is the initial time that we will run in idle maintenance mode
Scaling factor to apply to the light idle mode time each time we complete a cycle
This is the maximum time we will run in idle maintenence mode
This is the minimum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the maximum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a light doze
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a full doze
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is handling a notification
Maintenance mode light idle min timeout
Maintenance mode light idle max timeout
Maintenance mode light doze min timeout
Maintenance mode full doze min timeout
No kernel wakelock stats file /proc/wakelocks or /sys/kernel/debug/wakeup_sources found.
Press reset to start collecting time in state data
Press reset to start collecting wakelock data
Please unplug power to get wakelock data
No states file found. Are you sure your phone is compatible?\n\nIf you are running a custom ROM or kernel, try contacting its developer to inform him that the states file is not readable.
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Customize navigation bar style and behavior
Edit the navigation bar layout and buttons
Wake device by pressing the button
Change the lock screen icon visibility
Force apps that support expanded notifications
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Show Battery Estimates in QS Panel
Enable to vibrate after call connect
Enable to vibrate while call is on waiting
Enable to vibrate after call disconnect
Double tap on the status bar or lockscreen to turn off the display
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Blink flashlight only in ringer mode
Blink flashlight only in DND mode
